tit.j: 五条駅 (京都市営地下鉄)

sen.j: 五条駅（ごじょうえき）は、京都府京都市下京区大坂町にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Osaka-cho, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Gojo Station is a stop of Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
sen.cmt: ”京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄”：”京都市営地下鉄”がだぶっていると考え、一方を削除したとして訳してあります。
sen.e: Gojo Station, located in Osaka-cho, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto City Subway.
Gojo Station, located in Osaka-cho, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Karasuma Line, which is operated by Kyoto Municipal Subway.

tit.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 烏丸通五条通交差点の地下にあり、プラットホームは島式1面2線である。
sen.e: Placed in the underground of the crossing between Karasuma-dori Street and Go-jo-dori Street, this station is provided with an island platform serving two tracks.
Situated in the underground of the crossing between Karasuma-dori and Go-jo-dori streets, this station has an island platform that serves two tracks.
Situated in the underground of the crossing between Karasuma-dori and Gojo-dori streets, this station has an island platform that serves two tracks.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 改札口は南北1ヶ所ずつで、北改札のみ駅員が配備されている。
sen.e: Two entrance/exit gates, one on the north side and the other on the south side, are provided, and only the north entrance/exit gate is manned.
Two entrance/exit gates are provided--one on the north side and the other on the south side--but only the north entrance/exit gate is manned.
Two entrance/exit gates are provided--one on the north side and the other on the south side--but only the north entrance/exit gate is manned.

tit.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.e: Kyoto City-run Shotoku Junior High School
The Kyoto City-run Shotoku Junior High School
The Kyoto City Shotoku Junior High School
sen.cmt: city run →city と統一しました。

sen.j: 五条警察署(四条駅と五条駅の中間地点)
sen.e: The Gojo police station (placed at the mid-point between Shijo Station and Gojo Station.)
The Gojo police station (placed at the midpoint between Shijo Station and Gojo Station.)
The Gojo police station (placed at the midpoint between Shijo Station and Gojo Station.)

sen.cmt: 国道→national route としました。
国道→national route としました。

sen.j: 京阪本線の五条駅_(京阪)とは、約800m離れている。
sen.e: Gojo Station (Keihan) on Keihan Main Line is located about 800 m apart from this station.
Gojo Station (Keihan) on the Keihan Main Line is located approximately 800 meters from this station.
Gojo Station (Keihan) on the Keihan Main Line is located approximately 800 meters from this station.

sen.j: 地下鉄四条駅と京阪四条駅との間が約1,100m離れているのに比べると短い。
sen.e: This distance is shorter than about 1,100 m between the subway Shigo Station and the Keihan Shijo Station.
This distance between the Shigo Station subway and Keihan Shijo Station is less than 1,100 meters.
This distance is shorter compared to that between the subway Shijo Station and Keihan Shijo Station which is approximately 1,100 meters.
sen.cmt: 原文の通りに修正しました。

sen.j: なお、2008年度中に京阪の駅は「清水五条駅」に改称する予定。
sen.e: The name of Gojo Station on the Keihan line is scheduled to be changed to Kiomizu-gojo Station within the fiscal 2008.
The name of Gojo Station on the Keihan Line was scheduled to be changed to Kiomizu-gojo Station within the fiscal 2008.
The name of Gojo Station on the Keihan Line was scheduled to be changed to Kiyomizu-gojo Station within the fiscal 2008.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 1981年5月29日 烏丸線が北大路～京都間で開業した際に設置。
sen.e: May 19, 1981: May 29, 1981: This station was establishied when Karasuma Line started its operation between Kitaoji and Kyoto.
May 19, 1981 - May 29, 1981: This station was established when the Karasuma Line started operating between Kitaoji and Kyoto.
May 29, 1981: This station was established when the Karasuma Line started operating between Kitaoji and Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 不要な月日を削除しました。

tit.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 四条駅_(京都市営地下鉄)(K09) - 五条駅(K10) - 京都駅(K11)
sen.e: Shijo Station (Kyoto City Subway) (K09) - Gojo Station (K10) - Kyoto Station (K11)
Shijo Station (Kyoto City Subway) (K09) - Gojo Station (K10) - Kyoto Station (K11)
Shijo Station (Kyoto Municipal Subway) (K09) - Gojo Station (K10) - Kyoto Station (K11)
